title: Welcome to my first Quarto website
text:
This is my first Quarto website.
The picture below shows my brain working at 100% learning about visual analytics.

Some recommended readings for this course:

R for Data Science, 2nd Edition
R for Visual Analytics
Text Mining with R

To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.

title: About this site
text:
This site is created as part my course work in Visual Analytics taught by Professor Kam TS. Through this module, I hope to improve my data visualisation skill.
